message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your offer, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I understand where you're coming from, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to go down to $92?
I'm willing to compromise, Bob! I can do $93, but that's as low as I can go. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I'm getting close, but I think I can do better. Would you be willing to meet me at $88?
I'm getting a bit frustrated, Bob! I've already compromised a lot. I can do $90, but that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand your frustration, Alice, but I'm still a bit short. I'll make one more offer: $85. If you're willing to meet me there, I'll take the deal.
